execution_plan.description: Find orders in the EU database whose customer_id does not exist in customers (orphan orders).
execution_plan.query: SELECT orders.id AS s1__id, orders.customer_id AS s1__customer_id FROM orders LEFT JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.id WHERE customers.id IS NULL;

execution_plan.description: Find orders in the US database whose customer_id does not exist in customers (orphan orders).
execution_plan.query: SELECT orders.id AS s2__id, orders.customer_id AS s2__customer_id FROM orders LEFT JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.id WHERE customers.id IS NULL;
